name: biz4ai
description: Biz4AI - AI Wizard is an AI-powered avatar-based companion platform designed to deliver human-like conversational experiences via text, voice, and video calls. The platform utilizes advanced AI technologies like ChatGPT, Whisper,and D-ID to simulate realistic interactions with digital avatars. It serves as a personal assistant, empathetic friend, learning companion, and wellness partner.The platform will be available as a cross-platform solution Mobile.
author: Tushar Choudhary
